website_summaries.verdict: Clean jewelry, as well as glasses, baby products, dentures, and other items with ultrasonic power.
pros: Clean waterproof watches and watch bands, dental items, personal care items, pacifiers, tools, and more
cons: Did not remove tarnish from silver or heavy oxidation
Tank cannot be removed from unit, making it difficult to fill with water and liquids at times

customer_reviews.title: As well as a jewelry store cleaner?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife, and she’s been really surprised by how well it cleans her precious stone gold, and platinum rings, watches, necklaces and other jewelry. She works for a large jewelry chain and I think she’s a qualified and discerning judge of quality in a cleaner. The cleaner works on everything from diamonds to ink the heads on your printer. She usually brings her jewelry to the store for cleaning, but now says she won’t need to any longer. As with most uktrasonic cleaners like this, it’s NOT FOR TANZANITE. We ruined a large and expensive stone doing this, so I thought it might be worth mentioning. It’s not however a flaw in this product.
customer_reviews.author: HDLikeMe

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this on a whim to clean my super dirty wedding ring with sapphires. My ring hadn't been cleaned in a year and wasn't able to take it to the jewelry store during lock down. Used this for 480s using the blitz cleaner and my ring came out looking like it does when I get it from the jewelry store. The before and after pictures speak for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany C.

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your money on this. My eyeglasses always collect some dirt around the edge that touches your nose, and this did nothing to clean it, even at the strongest setting.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: No seller response
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great the first 3 months. It began to work only sporadically and called company leaving a message that was never responded to. Would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.author: Glenda J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit on June 9th. I had a hard time trying to find out when the timer started. My jewelry did not come out sparkling. I plugged it in on July 18 to clean some earrings that had not worn for awhile. I plugged it in, the outlet went out, I reset it. Plugged it in again, and it wouldn’t start. Went to return it, and it stated that I needed to do that by July 10. It’s now in the garage waiting for electrical pickup. Don’t waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: TULA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Compact Jewelry Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful jewelry cleaner. I love the size as it fits perfectly on my bathroom counter. Used it for the first time this morning and my jewelry has never looked this shiny and new. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kennesaw

customer_reviews.title: Ukoke, UUC06S, Ultrasonic Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after just 2 weeks. Didn't like that the cord was not removable. I use it everyday and its size makes it hard to dump the water and cleaner out without making a mess and worry about water getting into the inside of the machine--certainly would be easier to clean with a removable cord. The "feet" also kept coming off. I didn't really see much movement in the water when it was suppose to be working, but I just use it each morning to clean and freshen my mouthguard so I guess it does a decent job for that. However, I would NOT buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as promised.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting bright, shiny jewelry when I removed it from the machine and was quite disappointed. Not only didn't it clean well but it stopped working after the second use. I only gave it a one star because I had to give it at least a one star to submit my comment. I would have given it a zero star.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Graham

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I'm a skeptic regarding products like this, but this is a safe, inexpensive simply designed product that does what it says. I tried it with only water, then water with a mild well-known dish washing detergent. It works best with a product actually made for jewelry cleaners. I used to use toothpaste and an ultra-soft toothbrush and tried putting my jewelry in a vegetable steamer. I have not used the product on silver or any porous stones. Does a great job on my eyeglasses, also. Skeptic turned believer.
customer_reviews.author: rewolfson

customer_reviews.title: Buy it Now! It’s super awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is AMAZING! It’s one of the best purchases I’ve gotten so far! I’be been a dog washer for over 4 years and I just won’t take off my rings. That being said, they get dirty. This brought their sparkle back to life. I also cleaned my mom’s wedding ring. The paw necklace actually shimmers in the light, it’s a little hard to see through the picture though. I would recommend getting a little toothbrush or something for the dirtier items, but this thing rocks. This is your sign to buy it NOW! You won’t regret it. Let’s just hope it holds up because it’s definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Lovely97

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my night guard for around 20 years and it has never been this clean!!!! So the question is why didn't I buy this sooner. for way under $50 this is so worth it. I have probably spent over this much for denture cleaners that don't really work. Used this last night when I received it and then this morning and am so impressed. Not only that but it came super quick. Cannot say enough good things about this. I have not tried it on jewelry yet but that is my next step.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean my Invisalign, and I highly recommend it for this purpose! I keep my aligners very clean, soak them in hydrogen peroxide every time I take them out, and brush them constantly, but as soon as I get into the second week, they always start looking chalky (no matter what I do). This machine got them cleaner than I ever could with brushing or bleach! They’re crystal clear, sparkling. Unlike bleach, this thoroughly cleaned my aligners without leaving behind any chemical taste or scent! I’m very impressed and highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Prime&Proper

customer_reviews.title: Manage your expectations
customer_reviews.text: Photos say it all. BOTH of the earrings were “cleaned”, 180, with detergent. They BITH came out looking like the one on the right. The one on the left is after vigorous rouge cloth rubbing. We will see but I’ve done 6 pairs of sterling earrings and the results have been consistently disappointing. I will update my review if my experience changes but at this point I think it depends on what you want to use it for.
customer_reviews.author: Scubafiend

customer_reviews.title: I am now a believer!
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes! I am a believer. I never thought that ultrasonic cleaners actually worked that well. This one is also super affordable and is at a fantastic size. I tested it with a super greasy bike chain and it was cleaned right off. It did take a bit of scrubbing afterwards but it was definitely a lot less effort than doing it by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Navi Uy

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: The ultrasonic cleaner works great. I used it on my old jewelry and it gets all the dirt from the small grooves you really can't clean with a brush. Only used it for one cycle and it took most of the grime away. Now the jewelry I used basically looks brand new. The build quality is pretty good and the ease of use is simple. So far this has been a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Compact Design
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for years now. Most of them are so pricey and they tend to be larger. This ultrasonic cleaner takes care of both of those issues at once! It is small and compact so it can easily fit in my bathroom cabinet for storage. It still has enough room to clean larger things like eye glasses, which I didn't even think to put in there. All I need is a little bit of dish soap and water to make everything shine. I am so happy with my purchase, this is a great little ultrasonic cleaner!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Try It. You’ll Like It!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday and couldn’t be more pleased. I have a pink sapphire and diamond tennis bracelet which I rarely take off so it gets very dirty. Taking it to be cleaned at the jewelers gets it looking beautiful, but that’s rarely convenient, so I thought I’d give this cleaner a try. Following the directions, and using a few drops of jewelry cleaning solution, I put in a bracelet which you could barely tell the color of, and a few minutes later removed a sparkling beauty that looked just as good as it did with any professional cleaning. Every other piece I cleaned came out as well.
customer_reviews.author: LeeBeeN1954

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, really wanted it to work. I tried it with and without a drop of dishwashing liquid. It seems to have added a slight tarnish to my ring instead of making it shinier, even though I used the "de-gas" feature. It did nothing at all toward cleaning my glasses or my wife's. I didn't think this was a risky purchase since such cleaners have been around for very many years, but this was zero value for money spent. I don't understand all the positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett Barouch

customer_reviews.title: Truly works !
customer_reviews.text: Bub, buy, buy this jewelry cleaner. After reviewing them all (priced both high and low), I kind of "blindly" selected this one. It works like a CHARM, my jewelry looks like new. My whole neighborhood borrows it. You will not be disappointed !!!!! And the price can't be beat, size is so easy to store too.
customer_reviews.author: EZ

customer_reviews.title: Woke amazingly!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband wants me to wear my engagement ring with our wedding ring all the time, he does not want me to keep them in a jewelry box. But wearing everyday makes my rings catch a lot of dirt. Even though I use a soft brush to clean it everyday, the side of the ring is very difficult to clean. After using this machine, the rings can be cleaned completely! I am amazed by the result. Now I don't have to worry about wearing dirty rings. Every week I just need to put them into the machine with some water. I can get brand new clean rings! So convenient! I am so happy this item.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene L

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Love! I compared to this to other brands that were more expensive and they are literally identical so I went with this one. I love the smaller size and ease of use. I opened it and immediately cleaned a bunch of jewelry with warm water and dish soap. Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good machine
customer_reviews.text: Well this works but it took 8 run-throughs at 480 seconds to get my rings clean and they weren't that dirty at all. I used the jewelry detergent too. Once I did that they did look nice..not great but nicer then they were. As for dentures they were GREAT.. Those turned out like brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Orla A. Nickell

customer_reviews.title: Great for glasses
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble with my multiple pairs of glasses being impossible to clean. No matter what I did, they came out hazy or streaky. Bought this device and a $5 bottle of cleaner (iSonic CSGJ01-8OZx1 Ultrasonic Jewelry/Eye Wear Cleaning Solution Concentrate). I popped in two pairs and set it for five minutes. Bingo. Clean and clear like new and much easier to clean for days afterward. When they start getting gummed up again, back in they go for another treatment. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: GomerKierkegaard

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we got this, we put it to the test. My wife grabbed all the stuff we could think of and little by little (taking all the precautions and following instructions of course), we cleaned it all up in this gizmo. Everything came out sparkling and looking like new. There were some items we had to throw in more than once but they were more heavily worn so we expected it. Even those though eventually came out looking fantastic. Definitely recommend this item. Just follow the instructions and take the precautions they tell you about on websites about ultrasonic cleaners.
customer_reviews.author: DanielS

customer_reviews.title: Check out dimensions and need.
customer_reviews.text: Unit works, but vibration on unit not really that great. Bought it to clean my electric razor and my hand razor with a blade. Takes a long time to clean. Could use a strong electric motor. Hand razor takes forever to clean even using hot water. Not that big to put eye glasses in to clean, said it could, but I think not unless you are a lilliputian and have really small glasses.
customer_reviews.author: rkwsr

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used this to clean quite a bit of jewelry I have and it does GREAT! It really makes my jewelry look like new. Be careful though how often you use it, it did cause one of my diamonds to fall out of my rings (I have a warranty, so it's okay), however just bear in mind how often you use them to clean. It really does make your jewelry sparkle though!
customer_reviews.author: Ivey Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good for cleaning dental appliance
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a little battery operated cleaner. This Ukoke model is more powerful, roomier and has a timer so I don’t have to babysit it. I was skeptical about the degass feature, but can see how the tap water becomes cloudy and then clear as this setting runs. Although you have to be careful when emptying it (I fill it with a cup) I find the care I take to keep water out of the electronics worth the results.
customer_reviews.author: GazNá

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for cleaning glasses.
customer_reviews.text: It generally works as advertised. I have had one problem though. It is advertised for the cleaning of glasses. After several cleanings I have noticed that the UV coating is coming off in spots. I therefore cannot recommend this product for cleaning glasses.
customer_reviews.author: james8254

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up because my wife wanted a jewelry cleaner. I was a little skeptical on how well this would clean. We used warm water and mild detergent to clean the jewelry. It was almost disgusting when this was finished cleaning how dirty the water was. I was very surprised on how well this did. I'm sure if this is used on a regular basis it'll keep your jewelry really clean.
customer_reviews.author: Heath Reed

customer_reviews.title: Cleans Harmonicas too
customer_reviews.text: I learned that an ultrasonic cleaner could give new life to old harmonicas and Ukoke, UUC06S, does just that. If you can't take your harmonica apart, you can still submerge it. It just will need some time for the comb to dry out before playing. Rejuvenated several harmonicas that I was going to throw away. Oh yes, my wife likes it too. Made her rings sparkle with just RO water.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Amazing job cleaning gold
customer_reviews.text: That is a before and after picture. Cleaning with a few drops of jewelers cleaner and warm water for 480 seconds. I am not blown away by any means. you can tell the jewelry is cleaner. The diamonds get a better shine/sparkle more when I clean with jewelry cleaners and a soft brush. The metal (gold) on bracelet and rings is gorgeous noticeably cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia/Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing jewelry cleaner with Just water
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that I don't like about this little ultrasonic. I recently added this into my jewelry studio and it's had a tremendous impact on how clean my new pieces are. I have used this machine both with Blitz cleaner and with only water. I cannot believe how clean my silver emerges in just minutes. This machine is quiet and is just wipes up to clean. I would Highly recommend giving this ultrasonic a go particularly, if you're in the jewelry trade.
customer_reviews.author: D. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy Mode for cleaning Invisalign
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help clean my Invisalign retainers. When I had just the trays that I kept for a week or two I only used the denture tablets. I got some buildup and needed to agitate with a toothbrush to get them clean. When I used this product along with Walmart branded denture tablets, I have zero buildup on my retainers. I use warm water, the big tray, and the tablets I mentioned. I set the timer to 480 seconds (the longest timer) and use the degas option. The results are fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted two months
customer_reviews.text: Mine has stopped working after precisely two months. I emailed Ukoke about a replacement and will update accordingly if they have good/bad customer service. My buttons no longer work properly, the on/off button does nothing and the timer button will turn it on and off, while ocassionally actually changing the timer.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: Didn't clean what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean detailed bike parts, but it doesn't get the rust off. Cleaned the non rusty parts of the nuts and bolts, but the actual rust remained. Returned it. Cleaned my jewelry nice, but the jewelry that had carving or detailing in the metal wasn't cleaned very well in the grooves. Not sure what the hype about these cleaners is.... I think a rock tumbler with sand would be a better cleaner. (maybe not for jewelry at least).
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: quiet and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I feel confident this will do a great job cleaning jewelry, but I purchased this to make liposomal vitamin c. It works perfectly. I love the extended timer feature. Makes the job so much easier. Very well made. Large capacity for such a compact product. That’s also perfect cause it doesn’t take up a lot of room when in use and easy store when not. Oh and it makes no noticeable noise. So quiet I put my finger in it to be sure it worked and wow, it works! Super please with this choice!
customer_reviews.author: northern light

customer_reviews.title: Nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical of the claims of this jewelry cleaner, but after using it, I love it. I can even put my glasses in there and clean them. Cleans up any oils from your face and gets rid of dirt at the nose pieces. Each piece of jewelry I have cleaned has come out shining and clean. I can see the cloudiness in the water for especially dirty pieces (rings get so dirty) so I know it is cleaning well. How it works, I can't tell you, but the vibrations and whatever it is doing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was because this specific product was the cheaper one from all the others on the search results but I tried cleaning a dirty coinnfor the max time limit based on the instructions I read thoroughly and it came out only about 10% cleaner. For anything important or expensive, just take it to the jeweler's - they'll clean it for free.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: STOP WORKING AFTER 3 MONTHS!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: This little cleaner is amazing. I clean my makeup brushes and jewelry in it. Everything comes out spotless. All I use is water and Dawn dish soap in it and everything comes out clean and sparkling. This cleaning machine is not for fashion jewelry. It's an excellent price for all the hard work it does. UPDATE: DO NOT BUY! STOPPED WORKING AFTER 3 MONTHS. I SHOULD HAVE READ THE BAD REVIEWS. DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bunny1227

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received an obviously used item. Had fingerprints and scratches on it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Fiyin

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it works.
customer_reviews.text: Found an old gold necklace that was in our washer filter from who knows how long ago. It was covered in all kinds of muck. I tried cleaning with regular soap and water. Bought this little gem and ran the necklace through it twice using nothing but water and man did it shine. Sure made a believer out of me.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Bierly

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you full to the line
customer_reviews.text: Soap and water, jewelry cleaner, CLR / 50-50 and water, all do what it is supposed to do. I use it often to clean misters for the porch CLR/water, the wife's gold=silver Pretty results jewelry cleaner. Soap and water for carb parts and engine parts. I keep 3 1 liter bottles of each solution next to it. They say don't leave it full with anything, why??? but I do empty into bottles when done and rinse-dry.
customer_reviews.author: kep

customer_reviews.title: Good Unit For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to clean jewelry and other stuff. It works great! I have just used a simple solution of Dawn dish soap and water and I am happy with the results. Just be aware that on old jewelry if the stones are not prong set the glue may be loosened by the sonic action. Otherwise, this little unit is great and I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Deb D

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought this sonicator to clean my jewelry and my retainers. It has worked really well. It’s not super loud and is easy to manage. I use it once a month and it leaves my jewelry spotless and shiny. In 10 minutes I have it set up cleaned and put away. This was a great item to buy. I don’t waste time going to the jewelers to get my engagement ring cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes but I tried it with cleaner solution and my jewelry didn't appear much cleaner. You are better off hand cleaning with a brush and solution. It is also much bigger than I realized, not something I'd be able to leave out between uses. Returned because it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 1 month.
customer_reviews.text: Used to clean dental appliance 2-3x a week. Stored it in closet for 1 month while waiting for new dental appliance and it would not work after that.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn E. Oates

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using I don't know my real jewelry I on my fake jewelry it works amazing everyone should have one I find it that it's better to use two drops of dishwashing detergent I'm using Dawn the jewelry comes out looking amazing I've even done all my eye glasses which also come out looking brand new
customer_reviews.author: robin cronie

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure this thing does anything. I used as per directions and had to run several extra long cycles to get any debris off of the jewelry. Had to use silver cleaner after, so I'm not sure what this is supposed to do. Doesn't work according to the description.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this, trust me! Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased what has to be the most useless piece of crap that Amazon sells and delivers. It’s going back. It did absolutely nothing for my jewelry. I had better luck using the red jar of jewelry cleaner, less time, less mess and less disappointment. Honestly walk away from this one. It’s not worth it. Either invest in an American made product or get a jar of the red jewelry cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this!! I was so excited to use it. I stood watching it clean, even opened the lid to watch. I put a little dish soap in to help clean and everything came out so sparkly and shiny. The stuff floating in the water horrified me and I dumped it out before anyone saw. Haha! Get it, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 boys

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I put in a drop or two of dish soap with a silver neckless and some rings. Based on previous reviews, I expected it to be loud but it was not. I used 380 secs and the jewelry came out sparkling clean. The water I dumped out was a bit cloudy so it must have removed a lot of gunk.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Borealis

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: The size is good for keeping in my cabinet. I used it to clean my eye glasses, rings and my eyelash curlers, the results came out well. I also used it to clean sunglasses, but it ruined the coating! Overall, this cleaner did the job better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Built like garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this exactly one month. The top cover hinges both broke off. The front face plate broke off. It is just not built well at all. It cleans fine, but don't expect it to last.
customer_reviews.author: David Sea

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jewelry Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice little cleaner, however, it didn't quite have the power I was expecting. Dirtier items had to be run through a couple of cycles before they came clean. I used a concentrate jewelry cleaner, diluted with water per instructions. I would recommend it for home use of items that aren't super dirty. I only gave it four stars because I did have to run multiple cycles to clean the items & jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: It works especially well with a tiny drop of dish soap!
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical for sure, but pictures do not lie! I usually take my diamond stud earrings every 6 months to get professionally cleaned but skipped this time because of covid. See the stuff in the middle of the circle, that's debris that came out of the earrings! Ewwww!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Banks

customer_reviews.title: Works extremely well for home use!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and use. Large capacity to hold several pieces of jewelry at the same time. I filled the tank with hot tap water and added a few drops of dish soap. I ran it at 480 twice and the photos speak for themselves! It may not do as good as a job with a professional jewelry store cleaner, but it is well worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Sandlin

customer_reviews.title: my jewelry looks brand new again
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine so much that I bought the second one for my MIL. It does require jewelry cleaner to go with it for the best result. I always use the maximum time and do them in batches. I also clean my fit bit and wash band with the machine.
customer_reviews.author: IBuytooMuchFromAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the second day. Crap design, crap materials.
customer_reviews.text: Cover snapped off the second day. Brittle, poorly-designed plastic hinge posts. Bad design, bad materials. Too much drama to swap it out. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Brian V.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use at good price.
customer_reviews.text: After years of using professional grade ultrasound cleaners for jewelry, I purchased this for home use. It works well and is very quiet. It cleaned the jewelry that needed cleaning, quickly and well. As a bonus, I tried my eye glasses and they have never been this clean.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly K.

customer_reviews.title: 30 day Warranty; Dead in 45 days
customer_reviews.text: I received this cleaner in mid-August with a 30-day return policy. I used this cleaner weekly for my eyeglasses and it worked great! After 6 weeks of use, it no longer works. I plug it in and nothing. I think the power cord is shot. I will contact manufacturer for assistance. This is why I specifically purchased a unit from an American company. UKOKE Headquartered in California, USA (909) 606-4551 or email at service@ukoke.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a different model
customer_reviews.text: This product worked so great for the first few months. It really cleaned some tarnished fake jewelery with just water. But the basket needs some type of handle so your hands dont have to be dipped in dirty water to get the basket of your items out. It also just stopped working after like 3 months. I forgot I bought it from here so I thought I would write a review to warn others.
customer_reviews.author: Erika S.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sparkly
customer_reviews.text: Brought my ring back to when I first bought it 😍 however I did notice another piece of jewelry I put in didnt really get cleaned very well. It seems to clean white gold and diamonds amazingly, but not as good for sterling silver.
customer_reviews.author: MAKENZIE

customer_reviews.title: Avoid. Not a good machine.
customer_reviews.text: After 10 separate 480 seconds/8 minutes cycles, my sterling silver rings were still dirty and still covered in black tarnish. See picture. I used water, dish detergent and what jewelers use: ammonia. This machine is bad. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: BestFapEver

customer_reviews.title: It's was a great gift for my mom.
customer_reviews.text: She loves it, and I use it to clean my glasses regularly. The results are amazing. We haven't bought any special cleaners for it either, just fill it with water and a splash of dish soap. The only downside is the buttons; they're terrible. The don't actually press down. And it's not always clear that pressing them led to the desired effect.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my ring
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to find a good way to clean my ring and splurged on this with the cleaning solution. It kind of worked, but not as well as at the jewelers. The problem is my ring has a lot of crevices underneath the diamond (see photo) and this did not work to clean underneath the diamond. Oh well. It works great for all of my other types of rings though.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa8631

customer_reviews.title: easy and efficient
customer_reviews.text: It was a breeze to assemble and use. I also used the recommended cleaning fluid and it really helped knock off the dirt and tarnish. It did not bring every item back to its original shine. Shined up gold but not silver. It did work to knock off a bunch of that green scale you get on silver after 2 cycles, but did have to use an old toothbrush to get it off completely. And was gentle on pearl and mother of pearl but would still recommend using the basket and testing on non-sentimental pearl items before using on your good ones.
customer_reviews.author: ebalson

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used these ultrasonic cleaners for over 4 years, two earlier models. This upgraded model moved the controls to the body of the unit, an improvement in reliability and longevity. I clean my retainers every day in this unit, using Polident Denture Cleanser. I am a dentist and regularly recommend this unit for cleaning of dental appliances .
customer_reviews.author: Walter B Satterfield

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, Quiet,  Effective
customer_reviews.text: Lots of good cleaning action, but the ON button is super sensitive. If I merely brush it accidentally, it turns on. I use it every day to clean dental device. To avoid mistakes, I get it ready, plug it in last.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Definitely easy to use right out of the box- big plus. The only negative was that several pieces had to be cleaned several times, and inbetween with a brush- so it's not as powerful as I expected, but this will make me clean my jewelry more often. Good price!
customer_reviews.author: totogal

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you use for cleaning resin printed figures.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great and did its job. The reason for the 1 Star review is after one month of using it for about 3 minutes, 4/7 days a week, the ultrasonic cleaner began to break apart and the plastic started to chip off in numerous areas. If you are planning on getting an ultrasonic cleaner for 3D printing, buy a more quality cleaner than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Carsten

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this product!
customer_reviews.text: This cleans my jewelry and watch just as well as my jeweler! I do use little jewelry cleaner liquid in the water, but other than that I just fill with some water, put stuff inside, shut the lid and push the button. So much better than soaking and scrubbing, trying to get under the diamonds and still not as sparkly.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to strip paint off of plastic miniatures. Got through about 10 hours of use, and then the lid broke off . Front plastic bezel is starting to come off. This unit works well, but is cheaply made. Purchased 20 days ago, and its falling apart. Wouldn't recommend. *Update* As of August 20th, the unit stopped working all together. Complete garbage. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Ryan M. Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: I definitely got a used one
customer_reviews.text: I got it a few days ago and haven't used it yet. It definitely came used, there was still some dirt inside, some scratches, and the cords were messy. The condition wasn't horrible, but I did pay for a new one. It was pretty easy to clean the debris away, just with some water. Still thinking about returning it and getting a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Cleans like it says
customer_reviews.text: We've cleaned a number of rings, necklaces, etc., with this product. Just add a little dish detergent and the jewelry comes out sparkling. Be sure to read the instructions that indicate what kind of metal you should not clean with this machine.
customer_reviews.author: gfa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work on tarnished silver jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this jewelry cleaner based on its good reviews. I must say, waste of money!! I used warm water & a few drops of Dawn dish liquid, which was recommended in the instructions for a deep cleaning. My aquamarine ring came out a little cleaner, But not as pretty & shiny as when I clean it myself with Dawn & a Q-Tip. It doesn’t work on tarnished sterling silver. My diamond ring didn’t look any different after running it through several times. I will be returning this
customer_reviews.author: "frankiefoxx"

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: DOA-the on/off/timer buttons did not work, so it ran continually once plugged in. Returned unit for refund.
customer_reviews.author: -D3

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: I had a house fire and all my jewelry was smoke damaged. My good jewelry was mixed up with my costume jewelry. I decided to clean it all myself instead of sending it out to a restoration company. I went through two bottles of jewelry cleaner and two manicures before I decided to buy this little ultrasonic cleaner. I’m so glad a did. It’s so easy to use and the pieces are coming out great with nothing but plain tap water and a drop of dish soap !!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Very Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using Ultrasonic Cleaner, so I don't have an comparsion. It's quite small but portable. I think it may not suit for a men's glasses and sun glasses. This cleaner does make some noise but I guess all Ultrasonic Cleaner has this kind of noise. It does not included solution so I used dishwashing liquid. it was cleaned very well and make cleaning the jewelery and glasses in handy.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: It cleans all metals, Jewelry items, watch bands, etc, safely. No more scrubbing with toothpaste and non sense chemical. Dirts and particles were at the bottom with clear view when cleaning cycle is done. It is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: This is a compact cleaner
customer_reviews.text: This cleaner really does do a great job on jewerly, and dentures as well. It is small and don't take up much counter space which is a real plus for me. It is pretty to look at and not an eye sore. I love how fast and quietly it does the job. Nothing I have ever seen works like this fabulous machine. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: janis heck

customer_reviews.title: Really cleans my glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean my glasses and jewelry. I like how clean it gets my glasses. It cleans all the makeup off the nose pieces and from around the edge of the glass and leaves them nice and clear. I have only used soap and water on the jewelry and it cleans them pretty well. I have not trued jewelry cleaner to see if that works better.
customer_reviews.author: Justtexas

customer_reviews.title: Works for My glasses and jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean My glasses and jewelry. It is easy to use. Works great on my glasses I can see the dirts being removed from the edge of the frame and water become dull. It also Works for jewelry, I can see they are cleaner than before.
customer_reviews.author: Toto

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever - if u like clean!
customer_reviews.text: I put pearls my wedding ring in first time thru with just warm water. Some took a couple rounds finally something that really works without chemicals only water - I put in tooth brush glasses lens’ pointing up - clean- mouth guard! I love this small unit!
customer_reviews.author: CarolynneRHarris

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Literally used this cleaner 5 times after it stopped working. Don’t waste your money on this product. Buy something better
customer_reviews.author: Pj j.

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I'm hesitant to give this any more than 3 Stars. While it does move the water it doesn't move like I've seen from other brands that run at the same frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Administrator

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Does little to nothing to my jewelry even with the use of jewelry cleaner. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LoulouG

customer_reviews.title: would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: great at first,, but before a couple of years it just quit..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerRosa M. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: It’s a gem itself
customer_reviews.text: This works great. All my jewelry comes out sparkling clean with little to no effort on my part. You just need a little hot water and cleaner concentrate. My jewelry looks as good as new!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It’s really works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this jewelry cleaner. My rings range from 40 to 15 years old and they now look brand new thanks to this great product! It’s easy use, well worth the money and small enough to leave out on your bathroom sink or your vanity. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad buy. But not 100
customer_reviews.text: It took 2 times to get my rings cleaned. It has a small vibration. I have yet to see any extra for hard to clean items. I look forward to using this on my glasses though. Not a bad but. But not 100 either.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ultrasonic cleaner
customer_reviews.text: In summer, the glasses are usually very greasy all day, so how to wipe them is not clean. I use it to clean my regular glasses and sunglasses. Besides that, it is small and easy to store. Close the lid to keep the cleaning oil in the container without an unpleasant smell. recommend。
customer_reviews.author: ke

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have been complaining forever that the usual method of cleaning my glasses doesn't really get them clean. Some wipes just move the dirt around and leave the lenses cloudy. Paper towels eventually abrade the surface of the plastic lenses. Now a three-minute bath in this ultrasonic cleaner leaves my new glasses spotless. The instructions could be better, and written with a better grasp of standard English.
customer_reviews.author: Arie J. Korving

customer_reviews.title: easy clean
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my grandaughter as a christmas gift. she cleaned all of her jewelry and loved it but what shocked me is i had her clean my eyeglasses and it did a beautiful job thank you
customer_reviews.author: marieevans

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Works well with cleaning solutions and dawn detergent. Doesn’t un- tarnish jewelry, but it says that clearly in documentation. Get your self some TarnX.
customer_reviews.author: Horst

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I wish I know about this product long time ago. Highly recommended to all jewelry lovers out there. Product easy to used no need of any chemicals add just used dawn detergent and your good to go. I don’t usually put reviews but I think any ladies out there need to have to save some money 💰
customer_reviews.author: KawaiiPanda

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for jewelry cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Works great for cleaning jewelry and glasses, as well as other small objects. The jewelry looked new again. I recommend this ultrasonic cleaner. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A compact cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It works well on small items especially from my burr coffee grinder. For a compact unit it has a good amount of power. Degas function is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: RONAA

customer_reviews.title: Good for fine particulates
customer_reviews.text: I'm an esthetician and I use it to clean Microdermabrasion wand tips. It's worked great. I wish it was easier to clean, I'm worried about getting water inside the electrical part.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It does not work at all for me.
customer_reviews.text: The ad said it created a rush of exploding bubbles which looked like a gusher. In fact it looked like the air bubbles from a drowning termite if you get my meaning. There was no vibration in the water as in other sonic cleaners I have seen. It was just nothing. Sorry but that is what it looked like to me.
customer_reviews.author: CozMoDan

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I had a different brand before. This one is so much better. You can select different amounts of time. Diamonds sparkle after an ultra-sonic bath.
customer_reviews.author: Tiaramonkeybird

product_meta.title: Ukoke, UUC06S, Ultrasonic Cleaner, Professional Ultrasonic Jewelry Cleaner with Timer, Portable Household Ultrasonic Cleaning Machine, Eyeglasses Denture Cleaner, 0.6L, Sliver
product_meta.description:
Color:Sliver

About UKOKEHeadquartered in California, USA, UKOKE Technology supplies quality convenient products to our customers, which help families to finish their daily tasks in more efficient ways.

Simple, Customer Focused, and Technological are the three key concepts of UKOKE.


UKOKE USC06S Ultrasonic Cleaner

★ Professional Jewelry Cleaning Results Shining/renew your item by simply in mins. Simply fill the tank with water, insert your items, and you’ll see professional jewelry cleaning results. A bit of liquid hand/dish soap can be added for enhanced cleaning.

★ Degas Model for Maximum Ultrasonic Cleaning Performance Removing entrapped air or dissolved gases from water and fresh ultrasonic cleaning solutions makes ultrasonic cavitation more efficient. An ultrasonic cleaner equipped with a degas mode accomplishes this faster than operating a non-equipped cleaner without a load.

★ Ultrasonic Waves for a Deep, Gentle & Safe Clean This powerful cleaner packs a gentle punch 42,000 Hz of ultrasonic energy waves create millions of microscopic cleansing bubbles that gently lift dirt and grime away without using harsh chemicals or scrubbing. Producing a deep and thorough clean to penetrate the most difficult areas.

★ Touch Control Panel for Easy Operation The touch control panel is designed to be much more stable and Durable than ordinary button, Work with the digital display makes the ultrasonic cleaner extremely easy to operate. Just select the desired time and watch the digital display count down to the end of cleaning and then automatically shut off.


Features:

★ Degas: for Supreme ultrasonic cleaning performance

★ Touch Control: Much more stable and Durable than ordinary button.

★ Stainless steel chamber ★ Capacity: 20 oz (600 mL)

★ Interior dimensions: 5.4" L x 3.6" W x 2.1" H

★ Digital count down timer: 90, 180, 280, 380, & 480 seconds Enjoy the Simplify!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
